name: RPG Hunter
description:
Welcome to RPG Hunter!

This is a sequel of a game I made earlier, except using game maker studio 2!

More animals, biomes and more coming soon.

Controls:

Movement:

W - Forward

S - backward

A - turn left

D - Turn Right

Actions:

E - Shoot

Q - Sprint

Space - Scope

Other:

F - Change direction (180 degrees)

Shift - Lock on to targets

Trailer Music - Glitched 0ut - Pandas

NEWS - The news article for new stuff coming into the game.

Previous:

Jungle, with 3 new animals!

-Choking snake (Moved from desert)

-Crocodile (Comes at you unprovoked)

-Swamp fish (Comes with new, desaturated colors)

Sniper & Scope!

-New scope, can be accessed by pressing Space

-Scope vision can be upgraded in the shop

-Snipers! Sniper ammo can be used only while using scope

-Sniper Ammo available in the shop

Other:

-There is a now venomous snake replacing the old choking one in the desert.

-New forest near the left entrance of the jungle, containing only of berries

Latest Bug Fixes:

-Desert Berries no longer crash the game

-Detection feild for bees (Telling nearby bees to attack the player for attempting to destroy the beehive) is no longer visible.

-Using the scope can be used without depleting ammo

InDev: …?

Thanks for playing!
